definition: askew/at a crooked angle/devious/noxious/(coll.) to lie on one's side
noxious winds, evil influences (idiom); malignant social trends

sentences.english: The iniquities of the unions are her pet peeve at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 此時協會中的歪風邪氣是令她最氣惱的事。

sentences.english: My mom thinks video games are a social malady.
sentences.chinese: 我媽媽認爲電玩是股社會歪風。

sentences.english: This shows that as soon as we slacken our efforts, evil trends will crop up.
sentences.chinese: 這說明，一旦搞得不好，歪風邪氣就會。

sentences.english: All the malpractice does customers harm; good measures should be taken.
sentences.chinese: 此類歪風損害消費者，故應採取有效措施。

sentences.english: At that moment the risk of contagion would be at its greatest.
sentences.chinese: 到那個時候，這種歪風邪氣的風險將會上升到最大值。

sentences.english: We must eradicate the unhealthy tendency of cheating in exams.
sentences.chinese: 我們一定要杜絕考試作弊的歪風邪氣。

sentences.english: To take such abuse lying down would only encourage more of it.
sentences.chinese: 對這種歪風忍氣吞聲，只會鼓勵更多的歪風。
